title: VBA, Datepart, calendar week, 2019
body:
VBA, Excel give me the wrong calendar week in year 2019 .

I'll get the calendar week for the date: 30.12.2019, the week must 1, but give 53.

DatePart("ww", "30.12.2019" & y, vbMonday, vbFirstFourDays) ' ->Output 53


DatePart("ww", "31.12.2019" & y, vbMonday, vbFirstFourDays) ' ->Output 1
DatePart("ww", "29.12.2019" & y, vbMonday, vbFirstFourDays) ' ->Output 52

Quick look at the right calendar https://www.kalender-365.eu/kalender-2019.html It must 1 - not 53.

Has anybody an solution for this mistake?

-- regards raiserle
